name: The C.H.A.O.S agent
description:
You can play this game in browser or download it!

Note: You can't change sensitivity and Quit button in WebGL doesn't work!

Quick introduction:

You are a C.H.A.O.S. agent.  The C.H.A.O.S. organisation a.k.a. Conflicts Handled Agressively Obtaining Security organization defeats thevies by making a chaos in their out posts. Destroying weapons, messing with papers, cutting electricity, and destroying important objects. After it is done and when the thieves are most vounurable, The Special Forces attack. It is like a set up to make it safer and easier for The Special Forces. 

This is you first day at work. You learn skills and all goes smoothly until...

DevLog

I have reported my experiece, progress and emotions at the DevLog section.

Tutorial(If you get stuck);

How to play - Click "Play game" and then press the light blue fullscreen button!

Motion detectors - Those red-outlined circles on walls. If you get close them, you get spotted and mission is over. To avoid that, you can disable motion detectors by shooting them with your gun.

Document task - You just have to move EACH piece anywhere and task will be done

Weapon task - Just pick it up and throw. [If game gliches, try to aim at weapon and press F]

Wire task - Click on each of three wires.

Dynamite task - It is the blue shape on wall. If you aim at it, it will display "Dynamite". Just press E and it is done!

Controls:

WASD - move

TAB - toggle hide/show objectives

Left click - shoot

E - Interact

F - Disinteract

Space - Skip message/Jump

Shift - Sprint

Q - toggle on/off flashlight
